content.raw:
Arf too bad... I already got a branch with all this done... but I am on vacation until next week... I got some little fix to add too. 
Before merge into gazebo, can we merge #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2676 and https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/333/. Those can be extract from this plugin to simplify it. 
At last, arducopterplugin isn't needed as ardupilotplugin can handle all vehicle type !
